author: Ryan Lakich
title: This stunning 65-inch Sony 4K TV is $700 off, includes a $250 gift card
description: TL;DR: Buy the advanced Sony X900F 65-inch LED smart TV for just $998 from Dell as of April 2. Not only do you save $700, but you you get a free $250 Dell gift card to help you save more on some home theater accessories. We all have to do our part to social d…
content:
TL;DR: Buy the advanced Sony X900F 65-inch LED smart TV for just $998 from Dell as of April 2. Not only do you save $700, but you you get a free $250 Dell gift card to help you save more on some home theater accessories.
